bug.author: richardliaw
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>What is the problem?</denchmark-h>
The docs are super slow to load right now, and it seems like this is an issue regarding the gallery extension. <denchmark-code>Refused to apply style from 'https://ray.readthedocs.io/en/latest/_static/gallery-dataframe.css' because its MIME type ('text/html') is not a supported stylesheet MIME type, and strict MIME checking is enabled. </denchmark-code>
